name: GTTG Project - Difficult test
description:
This is Build 0.001c of the game, just to analyze the difficulty.

You already start within the mission, what I need you to test is the difficulty of the stage, that is... if you player can do gold or silver time with ease. You can play with gamepad or keyboard and the commands available in this build are just the basic ones, accelerate (R2 on the gamepad or A on the keyboard) brake (L2 on the gamepad or S on the keyboard) drift (O on the gamepad or X on the keyboard) and reverse (Triangle on gamepad or R on the keyboard) and finally Start which on the keyboard is ESC.

What I need from you player is the information on how long it took you to get gold (if you can) as well as tips or ideas to be implemented in the game, if possible share with friends or acquaintances because I need as much feedback possible .

PS. the menu buttons are not yet fully functional in this build, possible bugs regarding this have already been fixed and at this stage the player cannot use nitro, so this function has been disabled, and the game is in portuguese yet.
